nodes.text: Rodian Eyes were a species of green bioluminescent plant that grew on the planet Raydonia. It grew on thin black trunks with many curved upward facing branches, some of which had large green spheres growing part way along their length or at their tip. Rodian Eyes grew around the Raydonian settlement that the brothers Maul and Savage Opress massacred on Raydonia during the Clone Wars.

Rodian Eyes appeared in "Revenge," the 22nd episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars Season Four, which aired on March 16, 2012. The plant was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
